intent_atoms.description: Blocked tasks must be updated whenever blocker status changes to maintain day‑to‑day visibility.
Import licensed real‑world assets and refresh regression baselines so tolerant parsing and export scenarios can validate against real‑world payloads once licensing approvals are obtained.
Licensing approvals for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H fixtures must be granted before importing assets.

Execute the macOS 1 GiB lenient‑vs‑strict benchmark with ISOINSPECTOR_BENCHMARK_PAYLOAD_BYTES=1073741824, collect runtime and RSS metrics, and archive them under Documentation/Performance once macOS hardware with the 1 GiB performance fixture becomes available.
macOS hardware with the 1 GiB performance fixture must be available in the automation environment before running the benchmark.
Publish FoundationUI Phase 5.2 performance baselines in PERFORMANCE.md after manual profiling with Xcode Instruments on macOS developer machine.
Render times measured by Time Profiler must be under 100 ms, allocations under 5 MB, and Core Animation must verify 60 FPS on device for the manual performance profiling task.
Publish CI integration with performance gates after completing multi‑platform benchmark tests (iOS 17, macOS 14, iPadOS 17) once all required metrics are documented.

Build time must be under 10s for a clean build, binary size under 500KB release, memory footprint under 5MB per screen, 60 FPS during interactions, and BoxTreePattern with 1000+ nodes must perform within acceptable limits.
Compile cross‑platform test results and create a cross‑platform report after testing on iOS 17+, macOS 14+, and iPadOS 17+ devices and simulators.
All platforms must pass dark mode verification, RTL language testing (Arabic, Hebrew), and multiple locale/region testing before the report is compiled.
Achieve final accessibility sign‑off after manual VoiceOver, keyboard navigation, dynamic type, reduce motion, contrast, and bold text testing on real devices.
Accessibility score must reach 100% after automated tests and manual edge‑case validation before sign‑off.

functional_units.name: Import Licensed Assets
functional_units.description: Import licensed media assets and refresh regression baselines for tolerant parsing and export scenarios

functional_units.name: Execute macOS 1 GiB Benchmark
functional_units.description: Run lenient vs strict benchmark on macOS with 1 GiB payload, collect runtime and RSS metrics, archive results

functional_units.name: Publish Performance Baselines
functional_units.description: Publish performance baseline data in PERFORMANCE.md after profiling

functional_units.name: Generate Performance Report
functional_units.description: Document findings from Xcode Instruments profiling (render time, memory, FPS) into a report

functional_units.name: Create Benchmark Metrics Report
functional_units.description: Document baseline metrics for build time, binary size, memory footprint, FPS and performance of BoxTreePattern

functional_units.name: Compile Cross-Platform Test Results
functional_units.description: Collect and compile test results across iOS, macOS, iPadOS devices and simulators into a cross‑platform report

functional_units.name: Finalize Accessibility Sign-Off
functional_units.description: Complete manual accessibility testing and final sign-off on VoiceOver, keyboard navigation etc.
